mapper.select: SELECT o.ORDER_ID , ORDER_DATE , ORDER_EMP , e.EMP_NAME , ORDER_TYPE , o.CLIENT_NO , c.CLIENT_NAME , CASE WHEN COUNT(s.ORDER_ID) > 0 THEN COUNT(s.ORDER_ID) -- sale 테이블에서 개수 카운트 WHEN COUNT(b.ORDER_ID) > 0 THEN COUNT(b.ORDER_ID) -- buy 테이블에서 개수 카운트 ELSE 0 END AS count -- 하나의 컬럼으로 개수 출력 , ORDER_UPDATE FROM ORDERS o JOIN EMPLOYEES e ON o.ORDER_EMP = e.EMP_ID JOIN CLIENT c ON o.CLIENT_NO = c.CLIENT_NO LEFT JOIN SALE s ON o.ORDER_ID = s.ORDER_ID LEFT JOIN BUY b ON o.ORDER_ID = b.ORDER_ID GROUP BY o.ORDER_ID, o.ORDER_DATE, o.ORDER_EMP, e.EMP_NAME, o.ORDER_TYPE, o.CLIENT_NO, c.CLIENT_NAME, o.ORDER_UPDATE
SELECT CLIENT_NO , CLIENT_NAME , CLIENT_TEL , CLIENT_BOSS , CLIENT_EMP , CLIENT_POSTCODE , CLIENT_ADRRESS , CLIENT_POSTCODE , CLIENT_DATE FROM CLIENT WHERE CLIENT_TYPE = #{type}

SELECT product_no , product_name , product_unit , product_date , product_type , d.common_detail_name AS unit_name FROM product p JOIN common_detail d ON p.product_unit = d.common_detail_code WHERE product_type = '완제품'

SELECT mtr_no , mtr_name , mtr_type , composition , mtr_use , d.common_detail_name AS unit_name , mtr_reg_data FROM material m JOIN common_detail d ON m.mtr_unit = d.common_detail_code WHERE mtr_status = 'Y'

SELECT s.SALE_NO , o.ORDER_ID , o.ORDER_TYPE , s.PRODUCT_NO , p.PRODUCT_NAME , cd.COMMON_DETAIL_NAME AS unit_name , s.SALE_VOL , s.SALE_DEADLINE , o.ORDER_EMP , e.EMP_NAME , o.ORDER_DATE , s.REQUIRED_MATERIALS , s.SALE_STATUS , c.CLIENT_NAME FROM ORDERS o LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEES e ON o.ORDER_EMP = e.EMP_ID LEFT JOIN SALE s ON s.ORDER_ID = o.ORDER_ID LEFT JOIN PRODUCT p ON p.PRODUCT_NO = s.PRODUCT_NO LEFT JOIN COMMON_DETAIL cd ON s.SALE_UNIT = cd.COMMON_DETAIL_CODE LEFT JOIN CLIENT c ON o.CLIENT_NO = c.CLIENT_NO WHERE o.ORDER_ID = #{order_id}

SELECT b.BUY_NO , o.ORDER_ID , o.ORDER_TYPE , b.MTR_NO , m.MTR_NAME , cd.COMMON_DETAIL_NAME AS unit_name , b.BUY_VOL , o.ORDER_EMP , e.EMP_NAME , o.ORDER_DATE , b.BUY_STATUS , c.CLIENT_NAME FROM ORDERS o LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEES e ON o.ORDER_EMP = e.EMP_ID LEFT JOIN BUY b ON b.ORDER_ID = o.ORDER_ID LEFT JOIN MATERIAL m ON m.MTR_NO = b.MTR_NO LEFT JOIN COMMON_DETAIL cd ON b.BUY_UNIT = cd.COMMON_DETAIL_CODE LEFT JOIN CLIENT c ON o.CLIENT_NO = c.CLIENT_NO WHERE o.ORDER_ID = #{order_id}
